## Project Description

This project is based around the exploratory and predictive analysis of house prices within different regions, year, and income status. 

## Goals

The goals of such project is to analyze and predict Melbourne house prices and predict the future implications of such prices. We also aim to compare house prices and tendencies within each region and analyze the relationships between the location preferences. Another goal we can aim to analyze is the relatonship between income, year and median house price sold.
